title: The Brave Little Lion
author: Lina Mostafa
description: A young lion learns courage through friendship.

title: Sara and the Magic Tree
author: Omar Khaled
description: Sara discovers a magical tree that grants wishes.

title: The Lost Star
author: Sara Hany
description: A boy searches the sky to help a lost star find its home.

title: The Talking Rabbit
author: Mona Samir
description: A rabbit that can talk teaches kindness.

title: The Rainbow Adventure
author: Youssef Adel
description: A colorful trip across a magical rainbow world.

title: Omar and the Flying Carpet
author: Dina Fathy
description: Omar finds a carpet that can fly him anywhere.

title: The Secret Garden Door
author: Ziad Gamal
description: A girl discovers a secret door to a magical garden.

title: The Tiny Giant
author: Hala Tarek
description: A giant as small as a mouse goes on a big adventure.

title: Mira and the Moonlight Path
author: Nour Hassan
description: Mira follows a glowing path under the moonlight.

title: The Friendly Dragon
author: Rania Youssef
description: A dragon who wants to become friends with children.
